changeSet.author: kcando
changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.remove_all_building_inventory_item') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.remove_all_building_inventory_item GO
CREATE PROCEDURE remove_all_building_inventory_item @building_id dbo.id_t, @invenType TINYINT AS SET NOCOUNT ON
DELETE FROM dbo.Building_Equip_Item_Infos WHERE building_id = @building_id AND inven_type = @invenType
DELETE FROM dbo.Building_Inventories WHERE building_id = @building_id AND inven_type = @invenType
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.remove_all_building_inventory_item') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.remove_all_building_inventory_item GO
